entry.title: A Nightingale's Song
entry.summary:
Author: SunflowerSky22

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,420Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: When Kathy Jones was fourteen years old, she lost her best friend Jason Todd in a drunk driving accident. Eight years later, Kathy finds herself in a Gotham that had gone quiet. Whispers spreading that someone had taken control of the the Black Mask's associates and grabbing his territory. While the Batman and his associates try to look for answers, and Tim Drake readjusts to being a hero after years away from the field, the young hacker isn't waiting around for them to find those answers. Kathy, in the pursuit of information regarding this Red Hood figure, finds herself caught up in something she would have never imagined. In turn, finding something-someone-she had thought she lost.Or, we all have ghosts from our past, but no one actually expects those ghosts to walk out of the grave and into their house with guns blazing.

entry.title: The Heroes I Raised
entry.summary:
Author: Sweet_Ru07

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,061Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 63

Summary: when a new magical threat arrives in Gotham, all it's heroes gather to confront it despite their strained relationship with one another. however, despite their best efforts, tragedy strikes. And Bruce Wayne, surrounded by the bodies of his children, is given a chance to try again. with his dying breath he vows, he will do better, no matter what it takes, he will save them this time.This fic is inspired by the webtoon "The S-Classes Raised" but does not require prior knowledge of it, this is my first time writing for these characters and I accept any constructive criticisms. will update the tags as I go

entry.title: Bottom
entry.summary:
Author: Speechless_since_1998

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 848Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 181

Summary: “Did you talk to Selina? His ex?! ""Hey, she's cool" the other defended himself. "Of course, Clark is more cool, but he is Superman."Jason thought that Talia Al Ghoul was cooler than Superman, but he knew how much Dick hated her, so he said, "Ok, I'm about to repent, but what did Selina told you?""She said that Bruce is totally a bottom. "Jason didn't event time to horrify that a little voice asked, "What is a bottom?"Both whitening. Suddenly sproutd as only he knew how to do, in the midst of them Tim appared, looking at the t-shirt in Dick's hands with curiosity.Dick was about to open his mouth, but Jason hit him."Ouch! I didn't even say anything! " Dick protested.“He is nine years old, asshole. You won't traumatize him! "

entry.title: Batfamily Acidemia
entry.summary:
Author: Don454132Nie

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 52,051Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 120

Summary: Batman and his team the Batfamily are having a normal night in Gotham City stopping villain's like Victor Zsasz when suddenly the group head out to stop a recently escaped Joker who ends up using a Device he was given by his villain "Friend" Lex Luthor that can open portals to other universes. Joker ends up sending himself, his underlings, the Batfamily, and several other villain's to another world where 80% of the population have superpowers called quirks. Now Batman must work with the number 1 hero of this worlds japan and his apprentice Izuku Midoriya to get home and stop Joker, Penguin, Two-Face, and any new allies they may find.ORThe Batfamily and several DC villain's end up in the world of MHA and Midoriya and Damian end up going to UA together while Joker, Punchline, and Scarecrow join up with the L.O.V.

entry.title: This is What You Get
entry.summary:
Author: sagsunandmoon

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,779Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 124

Summary: title from karma police by radiohead-“I’ve gotta say Nighty-Night, you acrobat types are always so hard to catch! Twisting and flipping around, defying the laws of physics as they stand. But look at you now! Suspended and hanging like some sad, damaged puppet. Don’t worry though! I won’t let you get bored up there, we’re going to have so much fun together.”“Do- the theatrics… ever stop with you?” Dick manages to choke out, lifting his head slightly to show that he’s alert, that he’s not some broken puppet.“Well of course not! It’s just so exciting that you’re here. It feels like deja vu really. I can’t believe I get to do this twice, different bird, same cage. Tell me pretty boy, do you prefer the crowbar or should I change it up this time around?”-or dick is kidnapped by the joker and the batfam has to come and save him-my knowledge of these characters comes from YJ, arkham games, and fanfic, not comics. :) be nice pls

entry.title: Batfamily Shenanigans Throughout The Years
entry.summary:
Author: Melpomene_0

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,151Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 366

Summary: This is a collection of mostly fluff one-shots of the bat family. They're sweet, crazy, chaotic, and some nice stories to read while tired. The first chapter is a thousand and a bit words and is based around the young Batman au, where the league discovers how young Bruce really is. It also centers around some Bruce and Dick fluff where he's an actual good parent. The second chapter is Robin!Dick meeting the J.L. and I wrote it at like 3 am so I don't even know how long it is. The third chapter is a lovely, light angst and comfort fic about Bruce telling sleepy Dick a memory from his childhood. The fourth is a short fic based on Clark Kent talking with Brucie Wayne. The fifth chapter is an extremely cute fic about Dick making Bruce a card for Father's day. The sixth one if Dick's journey home after a mission with Flash and Green Lantern and Brucie Wayne dealing with the consequences of being crazy Brucie Wayne.I'll be updating the tags and the summary as I go.

entry.title: Family Crisis
entry.summary:
Author: librarylexicon

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 93,853Chapters: 25/27Kudos: 353

Summary: It was only after he had ended the call, in the small clinic room beside the sleeping Stephanie, that he pulled back the cowl and allowed himself to breathe. Alive, he thought, and the hope contained in that single word overwhelmed him until his throat grew thick and his eyes stung with unshed tears. Alive. At the close of the gang war, Batman uncovers an attempted deception concerning the life of his former protégé Stephanie Brown, and suddenly nothing is as important as his family. While Dick seeks absolution, Tim struggles with grief, Cassandra searches for belonging and Steph rebuilds her sense of self, Bruce faces the return of ghosts from his own past and psyche. (War Games AU)OR: Remember when Steph “died” and the Batfamily all went their separate ways as a result? In this world, that never happened, but the road to recovery after Blockbuster’s death and the gang war’s fallout is still far from smooth.
